title: Are you a budding creative writer? Enter our Summer Short Story competition!
text:
Calling all creative writers! Our annual Summer Short Story competition is back, and this year is the most forward-thinking yet. If you think you can write a story that will blow us away, want to see your work in print, and be in with a chance of winning a Samsung VR Gear Headset along with a 32GB Samsung Galaxy S7, you need to get writing.

Here's what you need to do:

Send Young Post a story that is 1,800-2,000 words long.

Young Post The story must be all your own work and set in Hong Kong.

This year’s theme is: 2047. You can interpret the theme any way you wish.

On your story's first page, write your name, age, school, and contact phone number.

Email yp@scmp.com with "2047" in the subject field and attach your story and a jpg photo of yourself.

The top entries will be published in our summer editions. The winner will receive a a Samsung VR Gear Headset along with a 32GB Samsung Galaxy S7.

Closing date for entries is June 26.
